scripts.build-sass: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --source-map false --output-style compressed --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --map false --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.build: yarn run build-docs && yarn run build-sass
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle docs/ templates/landscape/ templates/documentation-builder/ static/media
